name: Rumble Fists
description:
Rumble Fists is a casual beat-em-up game made with Pixel Game Maker MV.

The demo only support one player at the moment, but multiplayer will be implemented in the future, and below is a list of features will be added to the game later.

  • Co-op Multiplayer mode
  • Non-linear gameplay (Players can choose different paths that lead to different final bosses.)
  • 18 playable characters (Players will need to look for secret items in the game in order to unlock characters.) *Number of playable characters might be changed.

Note

I created the game in 320x180 and enlarge it 4x, equal to 1280x720.

Background music is from the Pixel Game Maker MV DLC music pack, final BGM will be different.

If you are playing the demo with a keyboard, below is the key blind.

Move = up, down, left, right arrows
Punch = z
Jump = x
Charge TP = a
SP move = s
Start = enter

It is my first time making game without any video game making experience, so feel free to leave comment.
